Room.Name: Restrooms Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the hallway going to the restrooms in the Dragon Tooth Inn.
Room.LongDescription: The door on the west goes to the Public Room where you will find Theronwold, the owner of the inn, serving drinks to a quite clientele. The hallway continues to the north. Theronwold is the new owner of this establishment, having recently opened the doors again after the previous owner was taken across the street to Dillsdale Memorial Park one Saturday afternoon and hanged for activies against the crown. Restrooms are located on the east.
